abstract: Justice Department charges former Heritage Pharmaceuticals executives Jeffrey Glazer and his brother-in-law Jason Malek with conspiring to fix prices on generic drugs; says pair are part of broad anti-trust investigation into generic drug price fixing; two men are also accused of stealing tens of millions of dollars from their former employer through sham corporations.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey Glazer and Jason Malek, formerly of Heritage Pharmaceuticals, are charged in a scheme to artificially inflate the price of two drugs.
snippet: Jeffrey Glazer and Jason Malek, formerly of Heritage Pharmaceuticals, are charged in a scheme to artificially inflate the price of two drugs....

headline.main: 2 Former Drug Executives Charged With Price Fixing
headline.print_headline: U.S. Charges 2 Ex-Officials With Fixing Drug Prices
